org.cell2d.celick.opengl.pbuffer

Class FBOGraphics

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cell2d.celick.Graphics
      • org.cell2d.celick.opengl.pbuffer.FBOGraphics

  • public class FBOGraphics
extends Graphics
    A graphics implementation that renders to an FBO
